description:
Spring and summer are right around the corner, which means it’s time to get out of your seasonal depression funk. Go outside, soak in the sun, and have fun with a Bluetooth speaker at your side!

JBL’s Flip 6 portable speaker is up to the task — and it just so happens to be on sale for $99.95 on Amazon, a 23% discount off its MSRP. You also get 90 days of Amazon Music Unlimited with your purchase, boosting the deal value even further up.

The Flip 6 can be the heart of any party with its loud volume, clear sound quality, and plenty of bass to bump to. It’s a good size, small enough to hold in your hand but large enough to deliver powerful audio, and also comes with a wrist strap to prevent accidental drops.

With its IP67 rating, the JBL
title: JBL’s portable speaker is $100 now — perfect for the warmer months!

description:
If you’re thinking of getting an SSD and you plan on taking it out and about with you everywhere, across all sorts of terrain in all sorts of conditions, then you need something that’s ruggedized — like the Samsung T7 Shield that’s on sale at Amazon.

Right now, you can grab the 1TB version for $100 (was $170, now 41% off) or the 2TB version for $150 (was $285, now 47% off). These are solid discounts on one of our favorite portable SSD models.

title: Samsung’s rugged T7 Shield portable SSD is over 40% off right now

description:
Samsung’s huge Discover Spring Sale is underway and there are some pretty impressive discounts going on, saving you hundreds on phones, smartwatches, and some of the very best monitors out there, just to name a few.

Let’s dive in and see how much you can save during this spring’s Samsung Discover event. New deals will be added throughout the week, so stay tuned for even more great deals in the coming days.

title: Don’t miss this blowout sale on Samsung SSDs, laptops, and OLED monitors
